results.content: Great voice but there is little transition in screen lectures or exercises to make me last more than 30 minutes sitting through this course. Not an effective way to learn for me.

response.content: I apologize Ladykillington for the experience that you had in my course and thank you for your feedback. This is a lecture style course that is intended to delve deep into the meaning and structure of what you build, so, yes, there is more talking than direct follow alongs. I feel that when you fully understand something, challenges and projects become much easier. Have a wonderful day.
